segments.text: Well , I ’ m glad I had a chance to see these samples , but I ’ m really not in a position to make a decision right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like me to leave the samples with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , why don ’ t you do that , and then you can give me a call sometime next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , Mr . Grant . Thanks for your time . I ’ ll talk to you next week .
segments.speaker: S2
